meanings.definition: Karoos: a type of landscape found in South Africa, characterized by dry, barren plains
meanings.sent1: The karoos in South Africa have very little vegetation.
meanings.sent2: We drove through the karoos on our way to the national park.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the karoos must be experts at finding water.
meanings.sent4: The karoos stretched out like a vast, empty canvas under the African sun.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the karoos lies in their simplicity and starkness.

meanings.definition: Karoos: the plural form of the word 'karoo', referring to multiple instances of the landscape
meanings.sent1: We visited different karoos during our trip to South Africa.
meanings.sent2: The karoos we saw varied in their level of aridity.
meanings.sent3: It felt like we were surrounded by endless karoos wherever we looked.
meanings.sent4: The karoos seemed to merge into one vast expanse of dry land.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the karoos changed as the sun set, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Karoos: the name of a region in South Africa known for its unique flora and fauna
meanings.sent1: Many tourists visit the karoos to see the rare plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: The karoos are home to some of the most interesting species in the country.
meanings.sent3: The karoos are like a treasure trove of biodiversity waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: The karoos whispered tales of ancient creatures that once roamed the land.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the karoos feels like stepping into a different world filled with wonders.
